description: Jane has been working as a Social Media Coordinator at D3 Company for 3 years now. She quickly became an integral part of the team. In her free time, Jane enjoys trying out new brunch spots and going for walks with her dog, Pug.

Since obtaining his CPHR certification, John has quickly laddered into the role of CEO at D3 Company. His efforts have helped the company's hiring process tremendously by streamlining efficency and helping pick out the best of the best candidates. Outside of work, John is an avid tennis player and enjoys watching his favourite baseball team, the Seattle Mariners.

Wendy has been with the D3 Company since its inception. She plays an integral role in ensuring that all office operations and administration are working smoothly. In her free time, Wendy enjoys going to different coffee shops and catching up on readin
